title: Ramp Agent / Lav & Water Agent
details: Serviced 1,486 aircraft potable water & lavatory systems in 6 months
Supported ramp ops incl. marshaling, baggage handling/sorting, & had begun to learn pushback
Communicated with Ground Service Coordinator, gate agents and flight crews
Interacted, supported, and worked alongside mainline and contract agents in a safe and effective manner
Interacted with and relied on multiple teams of mechanical repair service associates, maintained solid communication and open honest support

title: Shift/Operations Assistant
details: Led teams of 20-200 during peak periods
Worked as Lead Yard Marshall/Inbound Clerk in tandem with Shift Leadership Role
The standard, other job tasks as needed; so basically every position in the building

title: Assistant Operations Manager
details: Oversaw Fuel Centers, Pharmacies, Grocery, General Merchandise, and Perishable Depts
Managed compliance for EPA, FDA, USDA, OSHA, Health Code
Tracked product recalls and Country-of-Origin labeling
Acted as OSHA Officer, Safety Director of Ops, and supported internal training
Coordinated delivery schedules and oversaw Dept orders to assure minimal shrink
Mentored leads and associates toward advancement
